Logged 15mins to Harvest

Hi Jaqui, 

Confirming that I have made the updates on the new History page in Draft. 

Here's the link: https://wolper.com.au/?page_id=2471&preview=true

Let us know if you would like further changes.

Hi Rica Can you please make the following changes and send back to me in draft.
  • In the 1950 box please change the word 'will' in the second paragraph to have a capital 'Will'
  • In the 1970s box please change the text to " Throughout the 1960s and 1970s a range of surgical procedures were conducted at the Hospital, these included general, eye, urological, ENT, orthopaedic, gynaecological and cosmetic surgery.
  • Change the heading "1980s, 1990s, and 2000s" to '1990s'. And change the caption '1980-2000 WOL building' to 'Wolper in the 1980s'
  • In the Foundation section remove the caption on the photo of the Foundation logo - not caption is needed. Also add the button 'Read more about the Wolper Jewish Hospital Health Foundation' to this section
  • The last section change the heading to '2019 to today'
Many thanks Jaqui JAQUI HERMANOperations Assistant, Wolper Jewish Hospital T: 02 8324 2238 M: 0433691848 8 Trelawney Street Woollahra NSW 2025 wolper.com.au

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: Please clone the existing page and work on this in draft. Thanks

Hi Heath

I hope all is well with you and the team at Wolf. We would like to re-do our ‘Our History’ page on the website https://wolper.com.au/about-us/our-history/ <https://wolper.com.au/about-us/our-history/>

Happy to keep the style you have currently. I have attached a word doc with the new text and have indicated the picture to go with each section.

All the images are saved in the following dropbox

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/pdany6y4tvpzfu6/AAADLXnxBQQ3WdW2Mjr2aOwKa?dl=0 <https://www.dropbox.com/sh/pdany6y4tvpzfu6/AAADLXnxBQQ3WdW2Mjr2aOwKa?dl=0>

Could you please send me a draft of what it looks like before publishing as I will need to run it past the team for approvals

Many thanks
Jaqui



JAQUI HERMAN
Operations Assistant, Wolper Jewish Hospital
